display.title: Building a Sculk Forge
display.description: A Sculk Forge Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, Sculk Catalyst, Calibrated Sculk Sensor & Sculk Shrieker onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 1x Sculk Catalyst 1x Calibrated Sculk Sensor 1x Sculk Shrieker | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
